languages.text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

languages.text: “你说她是‘违禁与禁忌知识’方面的专家，这是什么意思？”
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: “你说她是‘违禁与禁忌知识’方面的专家，这是什么意思？”

languages.text: «Ha dicho "lo prohibido y lo ilícito". ¿A qué se refiere?».
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: «Ha dicho "lo prohibido y lo ilícito". ¿A qué se refiere?».

languages.text: 「『禁断と違法』と言ったが、それは何を意味するんだ？」
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: 「『禁断と違法』と言ったが、それは何を意味するんだ？」

languages.text: « Vous avez parlé de "l'interdit et de l'illicite". Qu'entendez-vous par là ? »
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez parlé de "l'interdit et de l'illicite". Qu'entendez-vous par là ? »

languages.text: "Ihr spracht von 'verboten und untersagt'. Was beinhaltet das alles?"
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr spracht von 'verboten und untersagt'. Was beinhaltet das alles?"

languages.text: "'Yasaklı ve etik dışı şeyler' dedin. Neleri kastediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You said 'the forbidden and the illicit.' What does that entail?"

traits.locale_text: "'Yasaklı ve etik dışı şeyler' dedin. Neleri kastediyorsun?"
